certifications.title: NPTEL Design and Analysis of Algorithms

projects.name: ProctorLess
projects.description: Developed an autonomous remote exam proctoring solution using Machine Learning and Deep Learning techniques. Built various AI Proctoring models which Included: Eye-Detection, Mouth open Detection, Malicious Object Detection, Plagiarism Checker, Headphones Detection and Speech Recognition Surveillance. Built a demo website for the deployment of AI solutions.

projects.name: Comparative Analysis of Recommendation Techniques
projects.description: Developed and implemented a popularity-based recommendation algorithm, achieving a precision of 0.528 and a recall of 0.201, which increased sales of trending items. Suggest items and users based on similar user and item preferences through memory-based collaborative filtering and applied model-based collaborative filtering model for better efficiency. Combined Gradient Boosting Decision Trees (GBDT) and Logistic Regression (LR) to enhance user-item recommendations, effectively addressing cold start and data sparsity issues, achieving an RMSE of 0.914 and MAE of 0.781.

projects.name: PCOS Detection using Visible Features
projects.description: Successfully detected PCOS using Principal Component Analysis (PCA) and ensemble learning techniques, achieving 82.22% accuracy with SVC, 93.2% accuracy with XGBoost, and 89.6% accuracy with Random Forest Classifier (RFC), thereby improving overall accuracy and F1 score.

experiences.description: Utilized advanced machine learning algorithms to develop a loan prediction model. Consistently completed weekly data analytics and model evaluation tasks. Gained hands-on experience with various data science tools and techniques, including data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model validation.

A Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) automatically analyzed each video frame to identify key elements relevant to the behaviour being studied. A Long Short-Term Memory Network (LSTM) processed the extracted features from the video sequence, capturing the order and relationships between them to identify complex behavioural patterns.
